document.full_text: clarke macarthur had a goal and two assists against his former team as the toronto maple leafs beat the buffalo sabres 4-3 on tuesday to keep alive their slim playoff hopes.
document.title: leafs edge sabres to keep alive playoff dreams
lines_and_colors: clarke macarthur had a goal and two assists against his former team as the toronto maple leafs beat the buffalo sabres 4-3 on tuesday to keep alive their slim playoff hopes.
